text:
<@U7SL518D6> Who would you recommend pulling together for a meeting to talk details/to-dos/roadblocks for the INBOUND Dev Meetup?
> (Would like to get a meeting together for next week)

For now I think it makes sense for it to just be <@UD53A9UUR> and I on the community side.

Presenters and people doing the other roles don’t need to be in the call, if there’s something the community should decide together we’ll bring it back to everyone/the appropriate people to discuss

Update: <@U26BLKGE4> and <@U2H3TT8F2> <@U25PYL3Q8> would also like to be involved in the call. :slightly_smiling_face:
anyone know of a good meeting scheduling tool that lets us all note our availability and it’ll just pick a time we’re all going to be able to do it?
HubSpot’s meeting tool I think only works for 2 people to coordinate
gonna try setting up a doodle see if that works
